build.lib.CausalLearning.algorithms.causalnex_algorithm.NoTears module

class NoTearsAlgorithm(algorithm='notears')[source]

Bases: object

prepare_data(Data, parameters=None)[source]

Prepares data for the NOTEARS algorithm. This function can be adapted to include specific data preparation steps for NOTEARS.

Parameters:

  • Data – Dataset to be used in the algorithm.

  • parameters – Additional parameters for data preparation, if any.

Returns:

Prepared dataset.

check_parameters(parameters, data_info)[source]

Checks if the provided parameters are valid for the NOTEARS algorithm.

Parameters:

  • parameters – Parameters to be used in the algorithm.

  • data_info – Information about the dataset.

Returns:

Boolean indicating whether the parameters are valid.

np = <module 'numpy' from '/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/numpy/__init__.py'>
structure_model_to_matrix(StructureModel)[source]

Converts a StructureModel to a matrix representation.

Parameters:

structure_model – A StructureModel object from causalnex.

Returns:

A numpy array representing the adjacency matrix of the DAG.

run(data, parameters, prepare_data=True)[source]

Runs the NoTears algorithm.

Parameters:

  • data – Dataset to be used in the algorithm.

  • parameters – Parameters for the algorithm.

  • prepare_data – Flag to indicate whether data preparation is needed.

Returns:

Results of the algorithm.
